name: location
description: Information about a physical or logical location.

children.name: desk_name
children.description: Desk name or individual location, typically for an employee in an office (for example, 'IN-BLR-BCPC-11-1121D').

children.name: floor_name
children.description: Floor name, number, or a combination of the two for a building (for example, '1-A').

children.name: name
children.description: Custom location name (for example, building or site name like 'London Office'). For cloud environments, this is the region (for example, 'us-west2').
